title: Ziggs support - opinion pls
body:
So, I've had that same person support me as fucking Ziggs 2 games in a row now and he's fed both games. I don't understand how people think it's good?
I honestly think it's bad, no sustain, hardly any peel, just poke...
But... some people think otherwise...
What's your opinion?
Good or Bad...?

replies.body: he just didnt get mid, so now he is "supporting"
I like support to able to stun or slow or heal me or some utility. Not just poke
total troll , teemo is the only real sup.

> [{quoted}](name=Settero,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GQfE1s8N,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-13T10:25:07.247+0000)
>
> total troll , teemo is the only real sup.

Legend
I think its bad, mana problems, poke is fine, no sustain for both team mates, no blue whole early game
